unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_ar.text: The servants of the Warrior-God – his chosen ones – live for war's struggle and glory.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: From his shattered kingdom, Prince Ushoran reaches forth and makes Lahmian dreams a twisted, hateful reality.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_sp.text: Every mariner has heard the tale of Vangheist, and now his restless spirit is summoned on board the Shadewraith to deliver a devastating broadside.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_cha.text: The speed and agility of the great three-horned ruler is sometimes bestowed upon his subjects.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_ite.text: When this ancient, fossilised horn is sounded a cloud of disarray falls upon the enemy but emboldens the Gors.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: Forged by the blind priests of the Elven God of Smiths, and imbued with his skill and shrewdness, the hammer crushes all it touches.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: This fetid potion knits bones, seals flesh and stanches the flow of blood from mortal wounds.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_hero.text: Flies surround this rotting creature, making combat even harder as the swarm buzzes into mouths, ears and other vulnerable orifices!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_pa.text: Morghur's Ruinous, transformative aura turns outwards, tearing at the sanity and flesh of those who dare step close.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_sp.text: Necromancers can awaken mortal remains to reinforce their Undead legions.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_he.text: Staying close to his mutated beasts allows the Packmaster to keep them in check and within reach of his rudimentary field surgery skills.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Spirits of the departed assail the Wizard’s foes, sapping their resolve and causing dread among their numbers.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_lo.text: A sudden sprouting of savage Dryads is often the first tangible warning that the forest’s savagery has truly been unleashed.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: "If you thought them Hags smelt bad from a distance, just wait until you get up close…"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_ite.text: These cursed items are all manner of blasphemy, from skulls of dead priests to hallowed, torn branches of Loren.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_fi.text: Ammunition for all units will periodically be replenished during Final Battle

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc07_lor.text: More than just a Knight, Alberic is a true leader of men whose warriors are emboldened by his fighting spirit in battle.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_uni.text: As if the enemy were caught in a blizzard or wading through treacle, the ice-cold aura slows any unit within range to a near-standstill.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Creatures of the dark beware, for the Mage casts a ball of pure light to banish enemies of white wizardry.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: This tome has been studied throughout the ages, yet its covers remain as blue and pristine as the day it was bound.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_un.text: Typically used to ensnare, immobilise and truss wild beasts, the Ravagers utilise their steel-wire nets against their foes to the same debilitating effect.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_twa03_lo.text: With a piercing stare, Rakarth makes known his innate cruelty and bloodlust to his beastly kindred spirits, thus subduing them.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_lo.text: A symbol of ancient, holy significance, the magical lily only grows where the Lady appears, and is carried to war as sign of Her warriors' devotion.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_lor.text: Elven leaders’ keen eyes can spot an enemy at a distance that defies belief, and so they demand the same of their troops.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_run.text: The secret of this powerful rune was given to a Runelord by Valaya herself, insulating all under its auspices with protection from magic.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_lor.text: The dense power exuded from the Anvil dampens any enemy magics hurled at Dawi nearby.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_char.text: Tyrants and Lords whose word is law ensure their troops will not run by issuing this dread order.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ar.text: In times of need, the Ushabti – bound with the souls of powerful champions – are awakened through powerful incantations, ready to fulfil their eternal duty.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: Unsurprisingly, some beings reconsider their options when faced with certain death.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_weap.text: The Runefangs are held by the Elector Counts as symbols of their stately office. They are immensely powerful blades of unsurpassed power that only Ghal Maraz could rival.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Focusing all his mystical might, the Pyromancer strikes the foe with a flurry of incandescent missiles.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: Without warning, a conflagration of the eight arcane Winds forms on the foe, creating a devastating tempest.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_sp.text: Lightning arcs across the battlefield, leaping from foe-to-foe with crackling fury until there are none left within the storm.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_lo.text: The Warden faces down his foes with grim resolve, his esteemed presence and indomitable spirit heartening to all those who fight alongside him.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_lo.text: This Lord's ability to withstand prolonged combat and show fortitude has a positive effect on those fighting nearby.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: When cast, this spell enfeebles enemy minds; they feel the crushing weight of reality bearing down upon them.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: A touch of Bugman's Courage can keep a Dawi standing and fighting, a touch unsteadily, on their feet.\\n\\n[[col:magic]]This ability is being mirrored using knowledge gained from a prisoner interrogation in Athel Tamarha.[[/col]]

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_que.text: Elite in their zealotry, intolerance, and combat abilities, Inquisitors serve the Church of Sigmar above and beyond the call of duty.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.text: The Hellcannon breaks its chains and rushes forwards. Increased movement speed.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_lo.text: Tz’arkan’s evil is a reflection of Malus’ hate; each gives them strength and always threatens to bubble over in devastating fashion.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: This magical lens amplifies damage from missiles in the area upon which its strange, ethereal gaze is settled.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ch.text: The strength at the base of the pillar; a near-immovable force.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: A wave of green energy emanates outwards, forming a shockwave of power that assaults any unfortunate foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_lord.text: Should the Royarch of fair Bretonnia fall, then the anger in its Knights and smallfolk shall be fierce.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.text: The Gyrobomber is fitted with much larger ordnance than the Gyrocopter. Should the multiple payloads hit their intended target the results will be quite spectacular!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc07_ite.text: Reaching to the highest heavens, the Wizard draws a wandering meteorite down upon the battlefield.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: When da Great Green Prophet’s Waaagh! gets really big, da boyz start to believe the hype – under him, they can’t be defeated!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: Blowing on a glimmering golden whistle, the Wizard summons the spirit of Gehenna’s metal hounds to hunt down his prey.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_ar.text: hidden passive that doesn't do anything but can be used to give siege attacker to forces

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_pro08_ch.text: By which the Dwarf Slayer and his mannish chronicler are protected from magical harm, forcing the foe into single combat they have little chance of surviving.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_he.text: The warriors of Avelorn are famed for their ability to fire and reload in the blink of an eye.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_ite.text: When this ancient and revered relic is blown, all Elven forces are driven to the Hunt with a savage determination.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_ite.text: A sliver of strangely glowing stone that when cast to the ground will generate a tremendous gust of magical wind.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_we.text: Those struck by Arkhan's deadly blade are charred to skeletons and then bound to his will forever.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_lo.text: Seized by hyperviolent visions, the Bloodbeast spasms and shakes in a violent thrashing of fiery convulsions.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_ch.text: Used to apply discombobulate effect to enemy army at the start of an ambush battle.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_ch.text: Possession of this orb enables the user to inexorably drag the foe into a turbulent vortex of pain and death.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Reaching to the highest heavens, the Wizard draws a wandering meteorite down upon the battlefield.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_lor.text: The Lord unleashes a force of seismic power like no other, causing the tectonic plates themselves to shift and buckle at his behest.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_lo.text: Fools brace themselves for the impact – realists get well out of the way!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: Conjured by a Bright Wizard or Chaos Sorcerer, a column of churning fire erupts from the battlefield, causing much destruction!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: A colossal orb of purple-edged darkness materialises - those who do not escape its crystalline touch are doomed for eternity!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_sp.text: As the names of Usirian are invoked, skeletal hands burst forth from beneath the sand to drag the foe to their graves.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_bann.text: This banner burns with a fire that can never be quenched, imbuing its bearers with flaming weapons and fiery eyes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: Fingers of light seep into enemy armour, attacking its wearers.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_lord.text: Those in command of the ranks will issue their orders with a ferocious bark, expecting instant obeisance.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: An intense inrush of Dark Magic causes an explosion that damages all around except the casting unit, who remain intact yet exhausted.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: Chanting passages from the Liber Bubonicus, the Wizard casts a hex of wasting and corrosion.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_we.text: Carved from Drakwald Oak and enchanted by a powerful Amber Wizard, its shots are guided directly into the hearts of Wulfhart's enemies.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: These Elves think they fight for their queen, Ariel, but in fact are under a powerful spell.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_lo.text: A poisonous cloud hangs indefinitely above the battlefield, raining down a fine spray of lethal toxins that corrode the enemy’s weapons while mildly sedating them.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: In Naggaroth, Black Dragon eggs are often consumed so that their devourers might take a portion of Dragon-strength.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_lo.text: The Engineer feels the raw, unrefined power surge over and through him, improving his fighting prowess and confidence in battle.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_ru.text: This rune has been used to surprise the Dwarfs’ foes with armour-shattering power since the world was young.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

unit_abilities_onscreen_name_wh_main_spe.text: Aspect of the Dread Knight Upgraded

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: When supernatural strength and speed work together, lesser opponents have little chance to counter.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_que.text: Ariel's blessings heal the wounded among her followers, their power increasing with the passing of time.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_lor.text: As the Lore of Ruin siphons the Winds of Magic, an unholy despair takes hold on the surface dwellers… the rats lurk in the shadows.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: The spirits of ancient warriors are summoned and lend their might to allies in the present.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: Crafted by the Elven God of Smiths himself, the Horn of Vaul bolsters all in earshot of its clarion call.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ch.text: Copious amounts of food constantly bubbles and brews in Grom’s astringent stomach bile, causing horrendous and explosive belching that he can barely control.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: Becoming more savage and frenzied the greater the scent and sight of blood.\\n\\n[[col:magic]]This ability is being mirrored using knowledge gained from a prisoner interrogation in Athel Tamarha.[[/col]]

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_ar.text: "Tattered sails, skull flags, and on the deck, zombies in rags; the beast cares not if you’re living or dead, in its belly is where you’ll head… Yet, all is not lost, the verse is complete, for the song is a rune to bless the Star-metal Harpoon."

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_lor.text: The living embodiment of the forest; through them, their warriors feel a greater call to war.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: The Vortex can heal as well as harm, producing magical energy that can invigorate and mend living tissue.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_cha.text: "The blood is the prize. The blood is the prize! THE BLOOD IS THE PRIZE!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_spe.text: The Wizard spits out an ancient curse, causing his enemies to age at an incredible rate - their hair turning white and skin shrivelling up.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: The caster utters words of power and a phoenix of pure fire manifests to swoop upon the enemy, bathing them in cleansing flame.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: This small black cube contains millions of tiny pin-pricks of light circling around a sphere of pure darkness.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc01_ite.text: This helm is covered with eyeballs that stare into the world as it was, as it is, and as it shall be. Those that can sift through the images are... changed.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_ban.text: The Gifts of Chaos are many and varied, each bestowing a twisted boon or warped blessing from the Ruinous Ones in return for the recipient's service.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_we.text: One of twelve magical swords belonging to the Empire's Elector Counts, 'Blood Bringer' is a mighty blade befitting Wissenland's important status as the centre of Imperial arms production.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: placeholder

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: Being a towering, walking cluster of rocks means that big bits sometimes fall off you, much to the detriment of anything smaller nearby!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.text: There are beings and creatures that can mend bone and knit flesh at an incredible rate. A mighty boon, but one stunted by fire.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_un.text: Steam Tank technology remains an inexact science, meaning they explode on occasion, and among the enemy's ranks if good fortune prevails!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_he.text: Possessed by a singular, apocalyptic vision and utter hatred, this champion proliferates the Dark Gods' will.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: The Armour of the Stars is a wonder, mage-forged plate decorated with gems over a deep-blue lacquer.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_moun.text: The magical aura surrounding this unit protects allies from harm.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: A foul mist wraps around the weapons of an allied pack, their blades dripping with noxious filth.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_char.text: Dark Blessings given freely from long-dead souls follow in the Wight Kings' wake. And so the dead strive for Unlife...

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_spe.text: Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc07_ite.text: Those struck by the Sea God’s trident are swept away by a crushing tide of furious wrath.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_ch.text: Possession of this orb enables the user to inexorably drag the foe into a turbulent vortex of pain and death.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: Dire greenish-black lightning strikes at the Skaven’s chittered command.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_he.text: What dead eyes see can never be unseen, nor spoken of.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_uni.text: The Gyrobomber is fitted with much larger ordnance than the Gyrocopter. Should the multiple payloads hit their intended target the results will be quite spectacular!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_pro03_lor.text: The Lichemaster raises the ancient Wight to do his bidding, but Krell serves Nagash first and foremost...

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_cha.text: It should be no great surprise that those already adept in the art of silent death continue to improve with time and practice.
All around are caught in a deadly miasma of virulent disease that rips through their bodies with vile momentum.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: Made from the pelt of a Middenland wolf and blessed by the High Priest of Ulric, a deadly hoarfrost surrounds the cloak, freezing the wearer's foes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: The spirits of ancient warriors are summoned and lend their might to allies in the present.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_he.text: This ritualistic war dance requires neither rhythm nor order, enabling evasion of the enemy’s clumsy attacks, and lethal counterattacks.

unit_abilities_onscreen_name_wh2_dlc09_s.text: Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades Upgraded

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Wizard casts an arcane net, created to hold the Great Deceiver himself. Any caught in its strands will struggle to act.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ar.text: The archers of the magnificent Tomb City of Asaph are the finest who ever died; their orchestrated volleys can devastate the ranks ranged against them.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_he.text: "I be leader now, yes-yes! ‘Til I die-die, or you find someone better!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: placeholder

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_lo.text: The mist provides unique protection to the Warden himself, magically manifesting a torrent of arrows that rains down upon those assailing him.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_un.text: The magical power surrounding the Casket of Souls allows the Liche Priests to infuse their incantations with a portion of its energy.

unit_abilities_onscreen_name_wh2_dlc09_s.text: Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm Upgraded

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: Grimy and ill-kept, this shield bears tainted hides, grisly trophies, and runes that are painful to look upon.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ch.text: It takes an iron will and unnatural - supernatural - strength to rally bound troops routed by magical means.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_lor.text: Vlad motivates his devoted followers with his majestic presence; the Lord of Undeath is without peer.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: Azhag has infused his strange magic into these pieces of metal. Not to protect the user, mind you, but more to fuel his own mad schemes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_sp.text: As the names of Usirian are invoked, skeletal hands burst forth from beneath the sand to drag the foe to their graves.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_ch.text: Unleashed upon a foe, these aggressive manifestations of the forest are utilised for their needle-like arrows that inflict painful wounds from afar.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_qu.text: The caster utters words of power and a phoenix of pure fire manifests to swoop upon the enemy, bathing them in cleansing flame.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_uni.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_ar.text: Grimnir himself seeks vengeance on the foe, smiting them with a hail of molten rock torn from the earth’s bowels.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: Prickly gorse bursts from the ground around the caster's allies, protecting them from attack like a spiky, living shield.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: The Circlet of Iron, said to be older than the Elven race, is a potent source of arcane power.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_uni.text: Those who dare to stand against this profane monument will suffer from its corrupting influence, to their demise.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_lo.text: The warding powers of the Ancients are manifested to harden the Asrai in times of their greatest need.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_wea.text: The so-called 'Northern Sword' fears no duel; anyone who dares confront him will surely meet their death!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_he.text: When Ghoritch fires up his Warpstone-powered piston-driven claws, everyone within his extensive reach witnesses the true meaning of violence!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: Woven into the fabric of this cloak is the essence of a star stolen from the night sky of Nagarythe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_we.text: Those who wield such an axe come under a grim resolve to fight no matter their wounds.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_we.text: One of twelve magical swords belonging to the Empire's Elector Counts, 'Troll Cleaver' is used to cull the myriad dangerous creatures rampaging around the extremely fertile 'East March'.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The caster intones the dread syllables once uttered by Nagash, restoring friendly targets.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: This gnarled staff looks out of place among the refined possession of the Elves. However, looks are oft deceiving…

unit_abilities_onscreen_name_wh2_dlc16_i.text: Acorns of the Oak of Ages

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_we.text: One of twelve magical swords belonging to the Empire's Elector Counts, 'Goblin Bane', as its name suggests, has cleared the insidious Greenskins from Hochland's vast tracts of wilderness.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: Those that drink this tincture may well be fools, but they are bold fools at that!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.text: The dead do not rest easily in the Old World. Those summoned by Vampires and Necromancers no longer have mortal concerns - they serve only their master's will.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_cha.text: Above the battlefield, the air is filled with arrows; a shroud of pure death blotting out the sun.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_ch.text: As they did in life, so they will continue to do in death and beyond.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_lo.text: Snikch leaves his distinctive symbol traced in blood beside his victims, so others will know the Deathmaster is abroad, and live in mortal dread.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_lo.text: It may be cruel, but the power to burn the foe to ash is extremely useful when you want to be sure of winning.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: The caster gestures twitchingly to the skies and fierce gales swirl about, making flight impossible.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_it.text: Time runs slower around the wearer, almost as if it acknowledges the idol's immense power.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: Warpstone-contaminated ore develops the strange property of absorbing light. Thusly, darkness forms around the trinket.
Tales of ancient valour, glory, and self-sacrifice are bound to inspire those of noble heart to greater deeds.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_ch.text: A thicket of briars will entangle the enemy, covering them in dry, flammable foliage.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_pro08_ch.text: Two blades are infinitely better than one - twice the attack, double the number of fell lives unceremoniously ended.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: When light is absent, the storm rages all the worse, filling the living with existential dread.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_lo.text: The longer the warrior remains in the fray, the greater their command of, and resistance to, the Winds of Magic swirling across the battlefield.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: Goaded by Chieftains and enraged by intruders on their blood-grounds, Beastmen become consumed by a savage furore!\\n\\n[[col:magic]]This ability is being mirrored using knowledge gained from a prisoner interrogation in Athel Tamarha.[[/col]]

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_lord.text: The ancient Shaggoth summons forth lightning to strike down his prey.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_un.text: Knowing where the trap is - that's the first step in evading it.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_ar.text: The best shot in the known world, made by experienced men who’ve lived - and perhaps died - the part themselves.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_it.text: Upon this stone plaque is inscribed an extract of the Prophecy of Sotek that grants additional warding to Tehenhauin.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: Crafted in the form of a grotesque face, this charm forces its visage into the minds of enemy sorcerers.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Conjured by a Bright Wizard or Chaos Sorcerer, a column of churning fire erupts from the battlefield, causing much destruction!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_un.text: This is a hidden ability that boosts the spotting range of all units in the lord's army to be roughly map-wide.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Warrior Priest implores Sigmar to imbue him with a modicum of divine strength, and now his hammer glows bright with power!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_lord.text: As the Vampires rip apart their victims they feast on the blood that spills forth – gaining in strength and lost stamina.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_uni.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_weap.text: This sword was said to be smelted in a cursed furnace and then quenched in the bloody body of a dying champion.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_ch.text: An explosion of this size rattles rather more than just teeth!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_que.text: Morghur's Ruinous, transformative aura protects him from damage most of the time, but he is vulnerable whilst it recharges.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_wea.text: This infamous blade bears a potent blood magick - even a slight cut will erupt in a geyser of gore.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: Hearing the call to battle, the Clanrats teem from every crack and crevice to consume and devour their enemies.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_sp.text: Green ribbons of Warp-Energy tear the flesh from the target’s bones. It's very nasty to behold – as nasty as it sounds, in fact – but far nastier, of course, if you're the recipient…

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ch.text: "This is just the beginning. When the Great Necromancer returns, all around will be laid waste!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Wizard extends an ebon hand towards the chosen foe, leeching its spirit through tainted sorcery.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_lo.text: Rotten mushroom gas wafted towards the enemy can cause them to lose their mind at the worst possible moment in battle.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: Kurnous bestows his supernatural huntsmanship unto the hunters of the sky, allowing their arrows to bring down quarry with the thickest hides.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_sp.text: Harnessing the sickly power of Shyish, the Wizard weakens the foe's will to survive the battle.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: The Dammaz Kron recounts every deed of infamy perpetuated against the Dwarfs, scribed in the blood of kings and infused with vows of vengeance.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: Some Dragons breathe noxious fumes that have a long-lasting effect on their target's coordination - if it survived the attack in the first place.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_it.text: Lord Kroak’s death mask protects the mummified head of the venerable Relic Priest. The hypnotic effect of the mask hinders any and all foes trying to attack him.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_lor.text: As the High Magic is channelled into the caster, its preserving energies form a dome of protection around them.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_que.text: A localised blizzard whips up around the Frost-Wyrm, its icy turbulence preventing would-be attackers from getting too close.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.text: The Hellcannon's blasts are devastating!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: Kemmler is surrounded by a dark cloak that swirls and twists with a life of its own.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_lor.text: It's a crazy piece of acrobatics, for sure, but it might just work; if it does, his opponent has no chance.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_lo.text: Unlimited power corrupts the already-totally-corrupted utterly.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: Dire greenish-black lightning strikes at the Skaven’s chittered command.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: A blazing aura surrounds the Pyromancer's chosen ally, shielding them with protective flame and augmenting their abilities.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_spe.text: This spell calls to the creeping things of the undergrowth, sending a swarm of spiders, centipedes and slug-beetles onto the foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: Despite Throt’s efforts to the contrary, the powers gifted to his troops often come with a price of a deteriorating life expectancy.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_un.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the Winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_lor.text: Setting their eye upon the foe, the general imbues their troops with Kurnous' spirit and the will to see his enemies destroyed.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_we.text: A sharpened claw at this spear’s tip is impelled by the rage of the ancient Forest Dragon to whom it once belonged.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_mou.text: As the clanging of the Bell rises alarmingly, the Skaven's squeaking escalates in unison; they know for whom it tolls.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ch.text: The Warden summons a magical cage that temporarily traps his target with no chance of escape.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_sp.text: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_spe.text: Harnessing the sickly power of Shyish, the Wizard weakens the foe's will to survive the battle.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_lord.text: The Winds of Magic themselves present little challenge to von Carstein, so matchless is he in his magical prowess.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_lo.text: As a follower of the Trickster God, Loec, the Shadow King is a master of deception and distraction.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Wizard issues a three word curse, hexing the target unit and blighting their ability to attack and defend.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_lo.text: Being able to slow the foe, drain it of energy and the will to fight on, is a mighty power to wield.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_un.text: The presence of the hated Lustrian Blot Toad sends the merciless Ripperdactyls into a barely-controlled frenzy of extreme violence!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: Starting off as distant, irritating shrieks, the terror soon becomes real – these suicidal Goblins have been granted the honour of personally delivering death to the enemy!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_ite.text: Whether by the crown's own properties, or by the grace of the Dark Gods, all things bestial and savage obey the wearer.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: Gesticulating wildly, the caster gifts an allied unit with a rabid, frothing need to attack and consume the foe!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_lo.text: Foliage and shrubbery oft suffice to hide from the mundane, but the King in the Woods is anything but.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: A freezing gale is conjured and sent to assail the target with ice and hail.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_spe.text: The Wizard extends an ebon hand towards the chosen foe, leeching its spirit through tainted sorcery.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: Driven forward by unholy micro-organisms within, even a mortally wounded creature can retain full motor function.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: Snare-nets are lightweight but strong and covered in hooks. They are used by Gutter Runners to capture live prisoners.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: By speaking Druthandor's name the Wizard is able to heal allies' injuries much faster than by natural means.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_her.text: The Dark Gods influence extends to the ferocity of their servants' attacks, increasing their power and reach manyfold.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_uni.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: A bombardment of unearthly projectiles; a storm that's extremely hard to weather.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_ch.text: Mirthfully looming out from their host, Terrors take on their most fearsome aspect to dampen the spirits of their horrified prey.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_spe.text: Harnessing the sickly power of Shyish, the Wizard weakens the foe's will to survive the battle.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_we.text: One of twelve magical swords belonging to the Empire's Elector Counts, 'Klingerach', also called 'Grudge Settler', has been entrusted to the Reiksmarshal to wield on the Emperor's behalf.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: A cackling, flaming visage appears before the Wizard. With a gleeful screech, it swirls around the battlefield, immolating anything in its way.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: The horrid diseases carried by some beasts are a wholly unknown quantity, infecting those who come into contact with them in some debilitating ways.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_un.text: Khaine’s bloodthirst drives the murderous flock into a frenzied crescendo, enlivening and rejuvenating his foul manifestations.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: White light bursts forth, quenching the spirit of the foe as a mortal might smother a spark.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_sp.text: The Wizard calls forth spectral winds that howl through the enemy ranks, tearing their souls from their bodies.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_lor.text: Oft-times, killers retain the heads of their victims as prizes or reminders of dark deeds done.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_her.text: The God of the Hunt blesses this arrow so it can travel great distances with unwavering accuracy and terrifying power.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: Over centuries, some Elves become so steeped in bloodshed that fear itself abandons them.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Lightning arcs across the battlefield, leaping from foe-to-foe with crackling fury until there are none left within the storm.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ar.text: In times of need, the Ushabti – bound with the souls of powerful champions – are awakened through powerful incantations, ready to fulfil their eternal duty.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_un.text: Beyond mere restoration of the flesh, even that which lay seemingly dead upon the ground could be knitted together once more.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: Unimpeded by armour and flesh, a Terrorgheist’s horrible shriek travels through its victims, splintering bones and souls, and erasing all memory of courage.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: Waves of pure High Magic infuse the target, radiating within the body, returning vigour and life.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_weap.text: Ghal Maraz is the legendary hammer of Sigmar. This rune-encrusted weapon is not only the symbol of the Emperor's mantle, but one of the most potent artefacts in the world.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_sp.text: Every syllable strips moisture and saps vitality from the bodies of Usekhp's unfortunate victims.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_un.text: These guardians of the most secret and sacred places can manipulate their environment to obscure themselves from foes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: Prickly gorse bursts from the ground around the caster's allies, protecting them from attack like a spiky, living shield.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_wea.text: When Orion hurls this living weapon with fierce purpose it fells the most powerful foes before returning to its master.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_un.text: The surprising ability to hold back death despite some seriously heavy opposition…

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: Some Dragons breathe noxious fumes that have a long-lasting effect on their target's coordination - if it survived the attack in the first place.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc07_uni.text: Far more than allegiance or loyalty, true dedication to Lady and kingdom further empowers her Knights on the field.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: This is a hidden ability that enables some flashy persistent banner VFX to indicate that a unit explodes

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The enemy target's armour begins to rust, disappearing in clouds of tiny flakes and weakening his defensive abilities.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ch.text: It takes an iron will and unnatural - supernatural - strength to rally bound troops routed by magical means.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_lor.text: Quite literally the cut-and-thrust of the Elven way of battle; every stroke is precisely made and finds its mark perfectly.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_uni.text: These warriors have something of an anger management problem. Funnily enough, no one has yet found a safe way to broach the issue.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_hero.text: The Lady of the Lake protects her Knights from the devious enchantments of the enemy.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_mark.text: Those who bear the Mark of Khorne are consumed with a violent rage and the constant need to shed the blood of their foes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: From deep within the Marshes of Madness, the Strigoi shall rise again!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: Crude though it may be, swiftly swooping in low to pepper the foe with rocks remains a most effective tactic.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_it.text: The cooling of this armour in the blood of Dwarf Runesmiths has imbued it with great powers – some explosive in nature!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_lo.text: The frightening manifestation of the Drinker of Worlds leaves none questioning the extremes one may go to for self-preservation.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: Few things embolden da ladz like the presence of a Rogue Idol on the battlefield, striding implacably forwards to bring inevitable doom to the enemy.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_ch.text: Bounding from branch to bow, the Luminescents’ magical spoors alight upon allies’ weapons to bestow a minor but lethal enchantment.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_lo.text: Drycha’s soul eternally seethes, her external wounds only further fuelling her vindictive, murderous intent.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_lo.text: As they careen and stagger about, their flesh irreparably charred beyond recognition, perhaps the foe will rue the day they made war on the Empire?

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: With strange aeons even death may die...

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_sp.text: Drowned sailors are easily bound, for they remember their last voyage and many of their worldly duties.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_uni.text: If a Squig is not told what to bite, it will bite anything. Me, you, itself - anything!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_weap.text: This blade was made from a single, searing flame that was hammered into material form and quenched in the body of a fire-djinn.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: placeholder

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: When a bomb is smashed, a dark smoke curls out, concealing those who wish to hide and choking everyone else.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_ar.text: Upon invoking the favour of Sotek, these snakes appear by magic, wriggling to do the bidding of their invoker.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: The qualities of metaphysical beings are highly advantageous in battle; the closer to death they get, the harder they are to see and touch.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: This spell causes gnarled, fibrous hands to emerge from beneath the ground, dragging the foe to a claustrophobic, suffocating end.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_ite.text: Once a Shaman, now a beast transformed by Wurrzag and retained as an example of Da Great Green Prophet's might.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_qu.text: Never stop fighting 'til the fight is done.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: The Mages of Tor Yvresse work tirelessly to ensure those defending the city are suitably supplied and invigorated to ward off all assailants.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_we.text: This rune-encrusted longsword has been passed down through Eltharion’s family for generations, bestowing unto him the zeal of his forefathers.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_lor.text: Kroq-Gar arises once more, born anew to take revenge upon those who stand against him.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_lor.text: Da Bad Moon offers heightened pugnacity to its weird and disgusting worshippers, spurring them to dish out even more pain.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_char.text: There are those who wish nothing more than to be at the heart of battle, seeking foes to vanquish.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_un.text: This ancient golden screen - as old as the fabled golden city of the Lizardmen - confers missile resistance to both the bearer and their allies.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_we.text: One of twelve magical swords belonging to the Empire's Elector Counts, 'Beast Slayer' has taken down many of the hideous monsters infesting the dark, dense Drakwald Forest.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: A swirling maelstrom of swords spin and slash their way across the battlefield in search of blood.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: The radiant heat of the Lava Arachnarok scorches flesh and softens steel. Coincidentally, it also provides the perfect sear on a hunk of Squig meat.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_it.text: Whoever dons this cloak does not just become one with the forest, but one with the hardened sentinels who guard Athel Caiellin’s fluctuating portals.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: A scroll describing a dread spell that fills the foes' minds with images from their own worst nightmares!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_lo.text: Grimgor fears no injury, but despite his war-ravaged appearance has an unmatched knack for avoiding it.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_we.text: A Warpstone-powered device, created by the Warlock Engineers, that crackles with barely-contained power.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_sp.text: The Curse of the Horned Rat is the dreaded 13th spell – the fabric of reality is torn and the Horned One’s children spill forth!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_we.text: This sacrificial dagger was crafted by the most skilled of Chaqua’s Skink artificers and enchanted to drip with deadly venom!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: The crystal protects those who worship the Serpent God, healing wounds and bringing supplicants back from the point of death.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_lo.text: This magical rock causes a rather large explosion that stuns enemies, slowing them down for the kill.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_que.text: The Terrorgheist's countless victims may never rest peacefully; the beast may call its victims to Unlife at will.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_pro01_lor.text: A bang, a flash - the foes stagger slowly and blindly whilst you take full advantage of their disarray.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: With the incantation invoked, the Skaven stamps his horrible, rattish foot, causing the very ground to split asunder.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_it.text: No purer sound is there than a single note from this great horn, capable of emboldening the faint of heart and rousing the timid.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: The burning pages bound together in the Book of the Phoenix will never burn their reader… unless his heart is dark.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_twa03_we.text: Pain nourishes courage in the hearts of the wild and fear in the hearts of the weak.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Wizard calls forth spectral winds that howl through the enemy ranks, tearing their souls from their bodies.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_uni.text: Age, beard-length, and the courage that binds them; motivation, if any were needed, to fight on to the end.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: Grimgor is a tower of rage at the best of times – but when his Waaagh! gets really big, he and his followers get really mean!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_it.text: By the grace of Gork (or Mork), Azhag’s magical armour is so ‘ard, it can even protect those around him.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_lor.text: If looks could kill… Oh wait, it turns out that they can…

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc07_cha.text: There are powerful beings who can decapitate a dragon or plunge a sword into the heart of a griffon in one mighty strike.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_lor.text: Centuries of Dwarf grudges flow through Belegar's veins, who uses them to wreak vengeance upon his enemies.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: Being a towering, walking cluster of rocks means that big bits sometimes fall off you, much to the detriment of anything smaller nearby!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: As the Flamespyre swoops, wreathes of fire squall off its wings in the bird’s wake.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_we.text: One of twelve magical swords belonging to the Empire's Elector Counts, perfect for skewering the foul tide of Greenskins which dares to ravage poor, rural Stirland's rugged uplands.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_sp.text: The Wizard conjures a crackling ball of Warpfire and hurls it at a nearby foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_we.text: Legend has it that the Star Lance strikes with the wrath of a Star Dragon, and cannot be unmade while the drakes still live upon Ulthuan.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_sp.text: Every syllable strips moisture and saps vitality from the bodies of Usekhp's unfortunate victims.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_lo.text: By which the dead don't stay that way for long, springing back into jerking, clanking Unlife.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_lo.text: The rallying cry of the ancient, endless, deathless, and vicious.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: This elaborate casket, encrusted with rubies, contains a spark from Asuryan's sacred flame; those nearby are granted magical resistance to fire.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc07_uni.text: Forming a wedge before the charge enables mounted Knights to smash through enemy lines, causing great disarray among their ranks.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_pro08_ch.text: Gotrek's "rememberer" has pledged with his blood to record his friend the Dwarf Slayer's deeds until the day he finally joins his venerable Ancestors.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_un.text: The Death Squad’s unnatural head movements and bewildering upper-body agility mean their enemies often hit nothing but air.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_lo.text: Such advanced ballistic skills tend to rub off on one's subordinates.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: Though seemingly fragile, this well-worn heirloom has seen a thousand battles and will see many more.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: Those afflicted by the Madness of Khaine are consumed by a mindless, rampaging bloodlust that debilitates every fibre of their being.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_sp.text: The runic energy within Thorek's mighty hammer builds and crackles, erupting in an earth-shattering thunderbolt.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc02_uni.text: The Flag of the Blood Keep flashes violently; the Blood Knights run their enemies down.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_spe.text: Bolts of Dark Magic leap from the caster’s eyes, withering flesh and blackening the bone beneath.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_sp.text: Mighty Lord Kroak spawns a small sun that, when it explodes, causes abject devastation… funnily enough.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_rune.text: The secret of this powerful rune was given to a Runelord by Valaya herself, insulating all under its auspices with protection from magic.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the Winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_sp.text: Imbued with the purest hatred for the foe and all their ways, to better bring about an ignominious end.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_weap.text: The legendary sword of an Undead mercenary, it is said the blade cannot be sheathed without first taking a life and will emit a terrifying squeal until it does.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: When planted in the ground this obsidian rod becalms the arcane winds for the briefest moment, allowing the Wizard to cast one of his powerful enchantments unopposed.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: Waves of pure High Magic infuse the target, radiating within the body, returning vigour and life.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: The Wizard destroys the foe from within, corroding their minds with doubt and crisis.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_it.text: This thorn-tipped dart carved directly from the Tree of Woe is magically engraved to cripple weapons and deliver painful injury.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: The vile cantrips written within the mouldering pages of the Liber Bubonicus are powerful indeed.
This bundle of incense sticks is blessed by the wardens of Asuryan, wreathing the bearers in scented smoke when lit.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_weap.text: The Hammer of Karak Drazh was struck with such powerful runes it can be swung with preternatural ease.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: The Mages of Tor Yvresse work tirelessly to ensure those defending the city are suitably supplied and invigorated to ward off all assailants.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_mou.text: Clouds of green-tinged Warpstone fumes fill the air around the furnace, spreading pestilence in their wake.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_lo.text: There’s no need to rush when your target has little prospect of escape.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: "From which tide do you hide? The dark moon’s tide is not on our side, so that is the tide that you must bribe."

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: The Gatekeepers are rightly seen as living bastions; those that wear this helm are talismans of sanctuary.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: The souls of many slaves brought aboard the Black Ark are ‘extracted’ and fired into the sky by sorcerous means, only to fall back to the surface as deadly rain.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_ar.text: "Tattered sails, skull flags, and on the deck, zombies in rags; the beast cares not if you’re living or dead, in its belly is where you’ll head… Yet, all is not lost, the verse is complete, for the song is a rune to bless the Star-metal Harpoon."

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_lord.text: Those that claim the honour of the Lady's Champion benefit from her protection even more than Knights who have supped from the Grail.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_sp.text: This pulsing, shadowy vortex barges into the target enemy, pushing them from the Wizard's path with a blast of magical energy.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_sp.text: Bolts of Dark Magic leap from the caster’s eyes, withering flesh and blackening the bone beneath.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_it.text: Shed from the Forest Dragon Bruwor himself, this Draconic scale has sentient vines that reach out like tentacles to ensnare nearby enemies.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: Skaven are craven by nature but take courage when in packs of their own kind, where they move slower but enjoy the safety of numbers.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: This spell causes gnarled, fibrous hands to emerge from beneath the ground, dragging the foe to a claustrophobic, suffocating end.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: The sorcerer thrusts his paws into the ground summoning forth a great gout of green flame.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: No matter how far away, none can escape the Kiss of the Deep, nor breathe again with lungs full of seawater.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_it.text: The ceremonial crown of he who protects Yvresse’s ancient metropolis is an inspirational symbol of dogged determination.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the Winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_pro03_uni.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the Winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: This spell temporarily transforms allies' mortal flesh into unbreakable rock, increasing tenfold their resistance to attack.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_weap.text: The Reikland Runefang is the symbol of the Elector Count of this province. It is currently owned by the Prince of Altdorf, Karl Franz.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_we.text: The inscriptions on this ancient staff name Nehekhara's many gods and goddesses, whose quiescent power is contained within its copper shaft.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_he.text: Consumed by all the rage of the Dark Gods themselves, Ghoritch turns himself into a whirling juggernaut of death.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: Using Dark Magic, the crones hurl a blood-filled cauldron at the foe from the Black Ark’s deck. Its impact is devastating, as the blood within is a foul, corrosive brew.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_ch.text: "Pale warriors, death-pale were they all; They cried—‘La Belle Dame sans Merci thee hath in thrall!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: Bound within this mighty sceptre is the power to move the mountain peaks themselves.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_spe.text: The caster intones the dread syllables once uttered by Nagash, restoring friendly targets.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_ru.text: This rune enhances its bearer’s awareness and quickness so that he moves more fluidly, taking faster opponents by surprise.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_cha.text: The authorisation to loose arrows without adherence to drill makes for an irregular - and therefore far deadlier - hail of pointed death.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_un.text: The more prominent the warrior, the better they are at stirring up subordinates to fight the ghastliest of enemies.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: When going berserk, savage, barely-controllable warriors become savage, completely-uncontrollable warriors; best keep your distance!\\n\\n[[col:magic]]This ability is being mirrored using knowledge gained from a prisoner interrogation in Athel Tamarha.[[/col]]

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: Wurrzag’s timeless message echoes throughout his Waaagh! – Gork and Mork are coming, and will grant da boyz strength to take on the world!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: Sometimes death is preferable to surrender.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_que.text: A turbulent thunderstorm roils around the caster, from which coils of powerful lightning snake forth.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: As the words of this scroll are read aloud, the heavens darken and lightning splits the skies, making flying impossible.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_lo.text: Ever circling the skies above, Gwindalor is always alert to events occurring beneath him and ready to respond to his mistresses’ calls.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_pro03_lor.text: The Lichemaster raises the ancient Wight to do his bidding, but Krell serves Nagash first and foremost...

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_lor.text: Elven troops will fight for Athel Loren, for their very souls are tethered to its fate.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_un.text: All Lizardmen are roused at the wailing cry of the Troglodon, its eerie call stirring their savagery.

unit_abilities_onscreen_name_wh_main_spe.text: Curse of Da Bad Moon Upgraded

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_lo.text: The dense power exuded from the Anvil weighs heavily upon the minds of enemy Wizards.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: "If you need the strength, then turn to me…"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_ar.text: This is never directly seen or controlled by the player.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_sp.text: The sea is summoned, and a great tide coalesces upon the battlefield to drench all those that oppose the caster.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_lo.text: The true hunter knows how to move swiftly when the forest's many predators approach, lest they become the hunted themselves.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ba.text: The basic requirement for fighting under the banner of Grimgor’s hard-as-nails Black Orc retinue is, quite simply, to survive his incessant warmongering.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_spe.text: A battle prayer that bathes the Warrior Priest in white, holy fire, sears Sigmar’s foes but leaves the supplicant unharmed.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_lo.text: Using rhythmic incantations endowed and employed by Loec himself to avoid Slaanesh’s gaze, one can stay unseen and uncaught.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: By speaking Druthandor's name the Wizard is able to heal allies' injuries much faster than by natural means.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: placeholder

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: This radiant golden totem generates a golden globe of power that shields those within from harm.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_uni.text: The ringing of the arcane bell atop the Corpse Cart inspires Undead minions to continue fighting, even when grievously wounded.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_spe.text: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_run.text: Armour inscribed with the Rune of Oath & Steel will not bend or buckle.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_lo.text: Tz’arkan’s dark influence waxes and wanes, but when Malus relinquishes control entirely, the Daemon’s supernatural strength is unleashed upon the world.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: Killing a Hell-Pit Abomination is never a simple matter; when it dies many fresh Skaven spawn to take its place.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_sp.text: The caster utters words of power and a phoenix of pure fire manifests to swoop upon the enemy, bathing them in cleansing flame.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Wizard spits out an ancient curse, causing their enemies to age at an incredible rate - their hair turning white and skin shrivelling up.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_lor.text: To summon the essence of Chaos is to unleash its Ruinous fury upon any and all who witness it.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_spe.text: The Wizard ensorcels allied weapons, making them burn with a savage fire. The targets of the spell are augmented with superior flaming blades.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: With an epidermis like this, at least there’s no longer any need to worry about others invading your personal space.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: Better dying through chemistry? Clan Moulder use revered Warpstones to give their troops unnatural, engineered advantage in the field.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_cha.text: By which an unexpected shower of pointy death rains down upon the unfortunate targets. Ouch!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ch.text: There is no evading this terrible malediction, and no escape; those caught in its clutches are execrated for eternity.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: To have the strength of a raging Daemon is to slay in one swipe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_ite.text: A potent sacrificial tool that radiates the wrath of a thousand different offerings to the Dark Gods.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_ban.text: This standard - an ever-rotting corpse beset by carrion birds - is a gross mockery of a scarecrow.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: placeholder

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_hero.text: The fires of a Runesmith’s forge burn brighter and hotter, its blessing upon an ally’s weapons increasing their potency.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_he.text: The Troll Hag bombards the target with a tirade of unintelligible Trollish invective, powerful and relentless enough to cow even the most stoic of hearts.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Reaching to the highest heavens, the Wizard draws a wandering meteorite down upon the battlefield.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_it.text: A momentary trance induced on a subject using this magical trinket instantaneously mimics the healing effects of a dozen deep sleeps.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_it.text: Along with his serendipitous standard-bearer, Niblet, who once somehow survived being sat on by him, the Goblin King’s banner brings inexplicable luck.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_lo.text: "Say hello-hello to my little friends, yes-yes!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_un.text: The Siren’s voice is a fearsome weapon – should its sound reach an enemy’s ears, their lifeblood begins to violently rebel through every pore.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_lor.text: Living flesh is the crucible in which the spark of violence grows to a roaring, unquenchable flame.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_cha.text: A Mage-Priest may channel magic through his willing minions to cast deadly spells at the foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_ru.text: First embedded in the gates of Karaz-a-Karak, the damaging aura permeating from this rune is enough to turn most enemies away.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_un.text: Because you can never have too much.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: This statuette is carved in a likeness of Xapati, and is frequently bathed in offerings of blood.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Blowing on a glimmering golden whistle, the Wizard summons the spirit of Gehenna’s metal hounds to hunt down his prey.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.text: If Greenskins believe something strongly enough, then, by the Green Godz will, it may be true. Hence Savage Orcs believe war paint protects them – and so it does!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_sp.text: This particularly unpleasant spell causes a putrid whirlwind of vile smoke, and alarmingly, stinging ashes to erupt around the target, leading to magical damage.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: Because you can never have too much.\\n\\n[[col:magic]]This ability is being mirrored using knowledge gained from a prisoner interrogation in Athel Tamarha.[[/col]]

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: This guardian phoenix, decorated with rare sapphires, holds a spark from Asuryan's sacred flame that affords its carriers magical protection from fire.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: The words upon this scroll, when read aloud, allow an ally to move at such a speed as to be unseen.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: With a chilling howl, the Shaman summons a great pale moon with a leering goblinoid face and large, tusk-like fangs.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_spe.text: Calling upon the beast-spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_rune.text: Stromni Redbeard made this rune in the days of Bael, Lord of Karak Azul - it was used by Durgin, grandsire of Grimnir, the Ancestor God of Warriors.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: "There are but a few who've faced 'im and lived to tell the tale - you can count them on the fingers of Bernard's 'ands… and 'e's got no 'ands."

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The targets of this spell are driven to go right after "hurty bitz" or sneak up on opponents at unexpected angles.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_ite.text: In death, a Terrorgheist may even be more deadly than when alive - its terrifying countenance improving the bearer's abilities by removing the need to rest between uses.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_her.text: The Dark Gods influence extends to the ferocity of their servants' attacks, increasing their power and reach manyfold.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: In a fit of fighting fury the target unit becomes harder than iron, increasing both its attack and defence capabilities.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: The sword of the beloved Scholar-King is a renowned wyrm-slayer.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_lore.text: Boosted by the positive energies of fightin' Greenskins, all Spells of Da Big Waaagh increase in power.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_twa03_it.text: This jet-black armour has been worked into the most cruelly delicate forms by the hand of a master far superior to any mortal artificer.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_lor.text: There is no other choice. There never was.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: As the Corsairs invoke the Bloody-handed God, fell lightning arcs from the sky; it is the lash of Khaine upon the souls of the enemy.
The souls of many slaves brought aboard the Black Ark are ‘extracted’ and fired into the sky by sorcerous means, only to fall back to the surface as deadly rain.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: The spirits of warriors slain can be summoned from the Realm of Souls and bound to corporeal bodies, so that they may fight for the Tomb Kings as they did in life.\\n\\n[[col:magic]]This ability is being mirrored using knowledge gained from a prisoner interrogation in Athel Tamarha.[[/col]]

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_uni.text: A touch of Bugman's Courage can keep a Dawi standing and fighting, a touch unsteadily, on their feet.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_pro04_uni.text: If you see him coming run as fast as you can… not that it will do you any good whatsoever!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: The amulet explodes into a million crystal shards if the wearer is struck, greatly improving their resistance to damage for a short time.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_ar.text: Valaya instils the Dwarfs with fortitude, lending new strength to the wounded and fresh resolve to wavering hearts.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_cha.text: The horn is fashioned from a single pearl-white seashell. When winded, it can split the veil between worlds and grant a blessing.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: While Lizardmen may be slow to react due to their cold-blooded nature, this also makes them stoic in battle.\\n\\n[[col:magic]]This ability is being mirrored using knowledge gained from a prisoner interrogation in Athel Tamarha.[[/col]]

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_sp.text: Deftly conjured and swiftly flung, the Skaven's fiendish Warp throwing-stars are, like all their weird scientific advances, explicitly designed to cause maximum death.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_spe.text: With a mighty bellow, the spellcaster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: Using Dark Magic, the crones hurl a blood-filled cauldron at the foe from the Black Ark’s deck. Its impact is devastating, as the blood within is a foul, corrosive brew.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_it.text: A momentary trance induced on a subject using this magical trinket instantaneously mimics the healing effects of a dozen deep sleeps.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_weap.text: Whenever this blade tastes blood, its wielder seems to exert greater control over the Winds of Magic.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: While all High Elves have excellent martial prowess, those that continue upon the path of the warrior will further excel in armed combat.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_ar.text: A great wind, symbolising the wrath of the Serpent-God, surges forth beneath the ground to consume the enemy.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_char.text: A strong mind is needed to channel the Winds of Magic. Those that have such a gift become arcane conduits - funnelling the magical tempests to their cause.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_her.text: The raw, corrupted hide of the Skin Wolf, scarred from its many spontaneous transmogrifications, forms a protective, armour-like layer.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Necromancers can awaken mortal remains to reinforce their Undead legions.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: Once swathed in the mists, the warriors become swift, adaptable, and unseen until the moment they strike.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_ar.text: This is never directly seen or controlled by the player.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: Being a towering, walking cluster of rocks means that big bits sometimes fall off you, much to the detriment of anything smaller nearby!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_lor.text: Even the simplest of spells can bring forth the full bloom of renewal, reinvigorating and healing the broken and bleeding.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: "Look at 'em all, trapped like stranded sea-turtles they are!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_un.text: In the midst of a bloodbath it's good to know that someone has your back.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Necromancer can awaken mortal remains to reinforce the Undead legions under his control.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_bann.text: Covered in the dried husks of many offerings, this banner oozes menace. From out of the webbed void in its centre multiple eyes gaze down imbuing those with venomous attacks.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: [ph] Not Visible.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: Not quite spirits, a terrible veil has been draped over these warriors.\\n\\n[[col:magic]]This ability is being mirrored using knowledge gained from a prisoner interrogation in Athel Tamarha.[[/col]]

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_lo.text: It's not just for decoration, you know!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_ar.text: Could it be that "the Lost" has returned from his impossible quest to wreak havoc upon the enemies of the Old Ones?

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The enemies’ weapons become heavy, cumbersome, and almost impossible to wield in battle.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_wea.text: A weapon created to kill the Dwarf-things, it perfectly suits Queek’s furious windmill style of attack.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: Chanting passages from the Liber Bubonicus, the Wizard casts a hex of wasting and corrosion.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_we.text: One of twelve magical swords belonging to the Empire's Elector Counts, Talabecland's 'Stone Breaker' has protected the founding province's thriving commerce from bandits of all kinds for centuries.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_spe.text: At the spellcaster's command, nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they first appear.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: When the rune within the dark ruby of the ring is activated a roiling ball of magic flame is hurled toward a nearby foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.text: Some warriors care not for their own personal safety and so work themselves into a whirlwind of destruction and mindless violence!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_cha.text: The resilience of the Old Ones is channelled into an energy barrier that protects its users from the full brunt of magical attacks against them.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_ite.text: Once a proud standard of one of mankind’s petty nations; it is now a wretched trophy blessed with all the Dark Gods’ malice and vainglory.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_lo.text: Goblins, in general, are a little twitchy to say the least. If you’ve flinched too soon, you’re probably already dead.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: A diadem of ithilmar with a radiant gem set within it, said to be a star plucked from the heavens.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_he.text: Those Engineers conversant in ballistics know how best to increase the ranges of their weapons.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_her.text: Violence bordering on absolute delirium; 'berserk' doesn't even come close.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: The Wizard destroys the foe from within, corroding their minds with doubt and crisis.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_rune.text: The uncanny glow of this rune is an awe-inspiring sight, apt to fill foes with debilitating dread.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_sp.text: Lightning arcs across the battlefield, leaping from foe-to-foe with crackling fury until there are none left within the storm.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_ar.text: Could it be that "the Lost" has returned from his impossible quest to wreak havoc upon the enemies of the Old Ones?

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_lo.text: By which the mind is concentrated on the task at hand, allowing it to be carried out effectively whilst keeping passion and abandon firmly in check.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_un.text: "Wade through blood and spill a bath-full more" is the code by which the legendary Carroburg Greatswords live and die.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_spe.text: The Bray-Shaman sends his mind winging into the wilds to possess a Cygor, then summons it to the battlefield.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: Despite being an adolescent in Dragon terms, Gordinar’s breath blazes with the intense power of the sun itself.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_bann.text: The mangled form of a terrifying scarecrow has spent too long under Morrslieb's glow. It was taken from the fields and now is a banner to frighten anything with wings.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_char.text: Da Boss ain't ready to run an' so expects da boyz to stay put too!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_ar.text: Even a stone wall which would stop most, if not all, comers is no defence against the unbridled fury of the wild.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_spe.text: The enemy target's armour begins to rust, disappearing in clouds of tiny flakes and weakening his defensive abilities.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_lo.text: Seeking a mighty death - despite his kingly obligations - Ungrim recklessly carves a path of red ruin through foolish enemies.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_ch.text: Possession of this orb enables the user to inexorably drag the foe into a turbulent vortex of pain and death.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: placeholder

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: The Skaven utters a vile phrase and belches forth an impossibly foul cloud.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_sp.text: Every mariner has heard the tale of Vangheist, and now his restless spirit is summoned on board the Shadewraith to deliver a devastating broadside.
