unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: The caster unleashes a vile disease that scours the battlefield in search of victims to infect and instantly petrify.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_we.text: The very late King Setep's ornate, curved sword shimmers with a blue hue that shatters the foe's armour.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_he.text: As soon as the Packmaster unleashes his beloved 'pets' upon the battlefield, their bloodthirsty hunt begins!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_un.text: Crude though it may be, swiftly swooping in low to pepper the foe with rocks remains a most effective tactic.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_wea.text: Both the Giant and his club smell absolutely repulsive, their repellent odour discouraging foes just long enough for this blunt instrument to do its messy work.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_run.text: The uncanny glow of this rune is an awe-inspiring sight, apt to fill foes with debilitating dread.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Wizard infuses his allies with Light Magic, freeing them from the passage of time and speeding up their actions.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_sp.text: Some things should never rise above the waves or be seen by mortal eyes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_wea.text: Mangelder saps the strength of mind as well as body. It is a weapon rightly feared across the Old World.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_spe.text: This spell unleashes a howling roar of such intensity that it mashes brains and bursts eyeballs.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_spe.text: Green bolts of purest spite burst forth from the Shaman and streak towards the enemy.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_sp.text: This pulsing, shadowy vortex barges into the target enemy, pushing them from the Wizard's path with a blast of magical energy.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_uni.text: Balefire contains trace elements of Warpstone, so the burning braziers slowly drive mortal men to madness.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Astromancer seizes the winds of the battlefield, directing them against the foe to batter the targets with unhallowed gales.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: Without warning, a conflagration of the eight arcane Winds forms on the foe, creating a devastating tempest.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_lo.text: Even if you survive the explosion, a surge of noxious fumes follows in its deadly wake.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_cha.text: In fitful dreams, he sees the end. The world collapsing in on itself, leaving nothing but ashes and aberration.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Wizard unleashes a hail of magical energy, transmuting his foes into Unliving golden statues.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_pro04_uni.text: Sometimes less really is more; the souls of the fallen feed the engines of war.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: The Frostheart is surrounded by icy shards and biting winds with every great flap of its mighty wings.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_sp.text: "They'll never know how many we are in this fog… Attack!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_un.text: So concentrated is the spurting vitriolic bile of this Jabberslythe’s wounds that it eats through solid armour to dissolve the flesh below.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Creatures of the dark beware, for the Mage casts a ball of pure light to banish enemies of white wizardry.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_we.text: Hidden ability to house vfx and boost splash attack impacts

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Bolts of cleansing energy fly from the Wizard’s hands, searing evil wherever they strike.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ch.text: Hatred this strong is infectious, contagious, and inescapable.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_wea.text: Soaked in centuries of Greenskin blood, the Ironhammer has been handed down to every rightful Angrund ruler of the Eight Peaks.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_ch.text: Hiding in their hosts' hollows are fiendish forms, ready to strike out at any who draw near.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_un.text: Fuelled by looted wine, the Centigors strut and swagger with vulgar bravado to boost their own vigour.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_wea.text: With a mighty bellow, the Wizard invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_it.text: Said to be a braid cut from the hair of the Sea-God Manann, this sacred artefact has been held by Bordeleaux since the reign of the very first duke.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: From the Ruinous Powers there is nothing to learn, for there is only madness beyond that veil. Instead, steel your heart and soul, gird yourselves in the armour of discipline and hate.\\n\\n[[col:magic]]This ability has been gained using knowledge from a prisoner interrogation in Athel Tamarha.[[/col]]

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Warrior Priest’s faith manifests in the form of a shield as hard as castle-forged steel.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_spe.text: Blowing on a glimmering golden whistle, the Wizard summons the spirit of Gehenna’s metal hounds to hunt down his prey.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_sp.text: An ancient Skaven spell that enables the Wizard to weaken their target's bones, causing different effects depending on who they are. All will suffer horribly, however.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_char.text: On the battlefield, the craven's path is an easy one, but for those champions that choose to stand? Fortune will surely favour them and their troops.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ar.text: The Undying swarm obliterates all in its path.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: High Elves excel as warriors, having trained in martial disciplines for the equivalent of many men's lifetimes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_fa.text: From within the Realm of Souls – Nehekhara’s revered afterlife – deceased warriors are called forth and bound to mortal remains, to find purpose once again through war.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_her.text: The herd charges out, slathering jaws and bellowing in fury. Against the charge, none can stand.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_spe.text: This spell causes gnarled, fibrous hands to emerge from beneath the ground, dragging the foe to a claustrophobic, suffocating end.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: When a big hulking mass of gobbo like Grom calls a Waaagh!, da ladz come running. Loot aside, there's always food to boot!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: A seductive glance; the glimmer of an idea; a soul tricked into eternal torment.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_lo.text: Etched upon the Anvil of Doom is a rune that can resonate with deep vibrations felt by both friend and foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_uni.text: Greenskins are never gracious in victory. Wherever they can press an unfair advantage, they will!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_he.text: Even the most vicious and impetuous monstrosities can be ‘encouraged’ to do one’s bidding with a quick jolt of Warpstone-generated electricity.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_cha.text: There is a sense in which the Skaven's natural cowardice can appear to be the very pinnacle of honourable conduct.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_un.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, eventually disappearing back to the Winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_sp.text: Kadon was able to shift his shape to that of any monster, even a Varghulf. One day he found he could not change back...

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_we.text: "The Time of Blood is at hand!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_sp.text: This particularly unpleasant spell causes a putrid whirlwind of vile smoke, and alarmingly, stinging ashes to erupt around the target, leading to magical damage.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Friendly units targeted by the caster are filled with magical energy, making them even more aggressive!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the Winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: Whether living or dead, career-sailors must quickly learn the ropes or find themselves locked inside Stromfels' Chest for all eternity.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_ch.text: The quest never ends, even once the questers have passed on.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_sp.text: This spell temporarily transforms allies' mortal flesh into unbreakable rock, increasing tenfold their resistance to attack.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: The Skaven caster disappears in a puff of greenish smoke, only to reappear elsewhere on the battlefield.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_lo.text: The enemy aren't going anywhere fast – in fact, they're not going anywhere at all!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_ar.text: A murky, debilitating vortex snakes through the enemy’s ranks as if Sotek himself is invoked, instantly slowing their movements.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: The Old Ones' sacred words, given agency through the written word, to smite foes who have hitherto lurked just out of range.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: Regenerating flesh is a gift from the gods, allowing the affected to heal their wounds.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: Though the boyz know that "sumfink’s not right wiv da boss", they still react with manic enthusiasm to his calls for an almighty Waaagh!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_lo.text: This tincture doesn't just heal, it also increases the user's hardiness, making them stronger than ever before.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_lore.text: Spellcasters who practise Death Magic can channel the life force of foes into their spells.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_weap.text: Shaped in the Daemon-forges of Zharr-Naggrund, Grimgor's mighty axe, Gitsnik, has never grown dull despite its constant use.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: The Spire creates a focal point for the Winds of Magic, ensuring they blow strongly to boost the power of nearby spellcasters.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_it.text: Sealed and bound with powerful glyphs, this jar contains the remains of a Liche Priest and all the magical energy at his command.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Harnessing the sickly power of Shyish, the Wizard weakens the foe's will to survive the battle.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_we.text: One of twelve magical swords belonging to the Empire's Elector Counts, this much-folded blade has caused many a mother's son to meet his maker somewhat earlier than planned.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_moun.text: The mighty griffon lets out a blood-curdling roar, chilling his enemies.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_spe.text: Ghorok was a legendary Minotaur, ferocious as a storm. His spirit-mantle is terrible but dangerous to the bearer.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_ch.text: "I've seen things you people wouldn't believe… Attacked ships on fire…"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_un.text: Goaded by Chieftains and enraged by intruders on their blood-grounds, Beastmen become consumed by a savage furore!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_qu.text: A single breath from the Hydra’s severed head causes a vortex of fire to blast forth, consuming its unfortunate target.
By which a plague of deadly Skaven Stormvermin are unleashed to overwhelm the enemy.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_lo.text: When it is done there shall remain but mounds of ash as far as the eye can see.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: "Look into my eyes and tremble, mortal…"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_spe.text: Friendly targets are filled with magical energy, making them even more aggressive!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_sp.text: At the spellcaster's command, nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they first appear.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: The titanic, deadly Hydras are notoriously difficult to kill; their broken bodies regenerate, rising up again to devour anew.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_ru.text: The Rune of Slowness hardens the air around those seeking to engage with honest Dwarfen axes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_char.text: Arise! Do not falter! Do not crumble! Back to life once more!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_ar.text: Kadon was able to shift his shape to that of any monster, even a Manticore. One day he found he could not change back...

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: Scrawled upon the Power Scroll are runes to boost the power of a single spell. Use it wisely…

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_ch.text: "Do pay attention or this one'll 'ave the shirt from yer back!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_lo.text: Vlad motivates his devoted followers with his majestic presence; the Lord of Undeath is without peer.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_lo.text: Masterful field surgery techniques and hastily administered steroid shots keep wounded monsters alive and keen to maximise the slaughtering.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_lo.text: One of the fabled nine Books of Nagash, this tome is one of the most potent sources of necromantic magic in existence.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_char.text: There are powerful beings who can decapitate a dragon or plunge a sword into the heart of a griffon in one mighty strike.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_lo.text: Beastmasters share their minions’ belligerence, cutting down foemen with lash, spear, and harpoon before claiming their twitching bodies as fodder.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, eventually disappearing back to the Winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_ch.text: These particular eggs bog the foe down in ectoplasmic goo, slowing their charge and leaving them prone.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_pro08_we.text: Gotrek's signature weapon is a battle-axe imbued with powerful rune magic, recovered from the corpse of King Thangrim Firebeard's son during the Dwarf Slayer's first excursion into the northern Chaos Wastes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Bolts of cleansing energy fly from the Wizard’s hands, searing evil wherever they strike.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: As old as Ulthuan itself, the Shieldstone pulses with warding and protective energies.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: The caster utters words of power and a phoenix of pure fire manifests to swoop upon the enemy, bathing them in cleansing flame.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: The symbol of Alarielle's rule of Averlorn is an ancient heirloom passed from one Everqueen to the next.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Conjured by a Bright Wizard or Chaos Sorcerer, a column of churning fire erupts from the battlefield, causing much destruction!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.text: A pulsing nimbus of darkness envelops the Black Coach, making it sleeker and more resistant to enemies.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_lo.text: The Sisters’ mighty Forest Dragon thinks nothing of hurling himself into the thick of the fray on their slightest word!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Mork gives the Shaman the ability to project beams of coruscating energy from his eyes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_un.text: Those that look upon the Jabberslythe for too long will suffer insanity, even causing injury to themselves in desperation of escape.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_que.text: From the fierce electrical storm whirling around the caster, bolts of lightning strike randomly, bristling with magnetic power.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: A bestial roar causes both spirit and strength to weaken.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_it.text: He who wears this ring is respected by everyone around him, whether he deserves it or not…

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_ar.text: The archer reaches for his next arrow, only to find his quivers dissolved and his bowstring slack!
This spell calls to the creeping things of the undergrowth, sending a swarm of spiders, centipedes and slug-beetles onto the foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: This cursed projectile of black fire will hunt out its targets. The magicks wrought mean the fireball stubbornly and spitefully refuses to miss.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.text: The Dark Magic binding has failed. Both flesh and necromantic energy slough off the subjects, leaving naught but dust.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_wea.text: Skarsnik's pointed staff, pulsating with magical energy, channels the might of Gork (or Mork) to lance out with weird, terrifying power.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_weap.text: Those that take a wound from the jagged blade of the Tormentor Sword will not only feel pain - their thoughts will be wracked with terrible omens.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: As the Corsairs invoke the Bloody-handed God, fell lightning arcs from the sky; it is the lash of Khaine upon the souls of the enemy.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_lor.text: Skarsnik conquered the Eight Peaks through cheating and manipulation, and he will do so again if needs be!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: By which opponents are prevented from marshalling their abilities to counteract Harkon's own lore.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_wea.text: Imbued with the quiddity of Ruin, Morghur's gnarled staff summons deadly Chaos Spawn to do his bidding on the battlefield.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_lo.text: From his most brutish creations down to his diminutive Throtlings, Throt’s knack for subjugating troops has them always fearing the possibility of failure.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: Piebald’s strange helmet has pipes connected which allow a form of mind-control; the foe is mesmerised on approach.
Though seemingly fragile, this well-worn heirloom has seen a thousand battles and will see many more.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: Throwing bits of yourself at the enemy is either a sign of great determination... or singular stupidity.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: As the caster utters a forbidden name, their enemies are wracked with waves of agony.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: Grom keeps da ladz riled up by keeping them as well fed as he; his big Waaagh! doesn’t fight on an empty stomach!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: Despite Throt’s efforts to the contrary, the powers gifted to his troops often come with a price of a deteriorating life expectancy.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: Crafted anew when an Everqueen ascends to the throne, the banner is a beacon of life and light.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_spe.text: Helman Ghorst, the maudlin Necromancer, uses his dark knowledge of the black arts to raise the dead and bring them under his control.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc01_ban.text: Woven from threads of pure magic, this standard is inscribed with runes that constantly writhe, while surrounded by coruscating fires of change.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: Beyond the power to raise and bind his Undead hordes, Harkon is barren; in fact, he emanates a field of anti-magic.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: This shield has a reflection so dark that it absorbs hostile magic and reflects it back at the foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: From within the Realm of Souls – Nehekhara’s revered afterlife – deceased warriors are called forth and bound to mortal remains, to find purpose once again through war.\\n\\n[[col:magic]]This ability is being mirrored using knowledge gained from a prisoner interrogation in Athel Tamarha.[[/col]]

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_ar.text: Grungni’s rune resonates with the fury of the Ancestor God himself, inspiring the smiting of foes and valour at arms.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_it.text: At opportune moments, an arrow pulled from this enchanted quiver is willed by Talyn's spirit to fly truer towards cruel hearts.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_it.text: Its wearer will become one with the mighty Terradons, who will then move in tandem as a single, mighty consciousness.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_her.text: The herd charges out, slathering jaws and bellowing in fury. Against the charge, none can stand.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_sp.text: A colossal orb of purple-edged darkness materialises - those who do not escape its crystalline touch are doomed for eternity!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_lo.text: The distilled essence of Aqshy weakens the foe's ability to withstand its righteous flames.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc01_wea.text: The Second Everchosen, Vangel, trapped the Greater Daemon U'zuhl inside this regicidal blade.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: Diversionary feints, feigned retreats – there isn’t a Waaagh! as tactically underhanded as Skarsnik's. And the bigger it gets, the sneakier da ladz must be.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_un.text: It’s raining death! A deadly rain of skulls comes down with bone-shattering force, sending lethal splinters flying in all directions.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: Skarsnik's is famously unparalleled in his sneakiness – when he calls a Waaagh!, the backstabbing nature of da ladz is amplified.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: There are beings and creatures that can mend bone and knit flesh at an incredible rate. A mighty boon, but one stunted by fire.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_her.text: The Dark Gods influence extends to the ferocity of their servants' attacks, increasing their power and reach manyfold.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: Dire greenish-black lightning strikes at the Skaven’s crude Warpstone implant.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: Portents of doom most often take the form of back banners festooned with skulls, clan symbols and hated runes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_ar.text: Summoned from the sacred host of Tzcatli himself comes a cohort of his most elusive Chameleon Stalkers.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_un.text: This ice-cold breath delivers freezing death, slowing down those who are fortunate to survive the exposure.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: The Yew's branches are supple, but its berries deadly.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: Warpstone's highly-unstable magical energies can be used to fashion devilishly deadly weapons.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_sp.text: Shadows solidify around the wearer's body, protecting them from harm while simultaneously making them difficult to see, and therefore incapacitate.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: The dark flames of Chaos burn flesh, armour and souls alike; the Ruinous Powers do not discriminate.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: Reading the dark scrawl etched upon the scroll will summon Arnzipal's Black Horror.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc07_lor.text: King Louen’s shield has protected him from the first days of his Knighthood; strengthened by enchantment, it will continue to do so.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_cha.text: By all means summon the bloodthirsty Goddess of the Hunt to assist you, but always make sure you thank her afterwards…

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_uni.text: Becoming more savage and frenzied the greater the scent and sight of blood.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_rune.text: As the Runelord hammers upon the Anvil of Doom, he shapes the Rune of Wrath & Ruin, causing the earth to crack and vent forth fire and sulphur.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_un.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, eventually disappearing back to the Winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_he.text: To his loyal followers, the Lord of Murder’s bellows of rage that echo throughout the multiverse strengthen them against cowardly sorceries.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_sp.text: Sword-blows are mysteriously turned away as Ptra's wife reaches out to shield Nehekhara's warriors from evil.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: Van Horstmann's small magical mirror has the ability to destroy the enemy if only they will look upon its cracked surface...

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_we.text: The Brass Bull wields his rune-inscribed axes with savage pride, constantly clashing them together in the rare moments between his rampages.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Shaman implores the sky with wild gesticulations. The almighty green foot of the Orc god descends to crush the foe!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_wea.text: This sword, created by Teclis, is charged with crackling energy that rends apart those struck by its shining blade.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_sp.text: The sea is summoned, and a great tide coalesces upon the battlefield to drench all those that oppose the caster.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: The Warpstone-infused armour plates of Queek Headtaker are as spiteful as their owner.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: A focal point of the Lizardmen's great Geomantic Web, from which arcane spells of great power are directed at the foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_lor.text: The Night Goblins are delighted and emboldened by Skarsnik's sly, furtive plans and fiendish machinations.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_un.text: Accursed relics from ancient barrows cleave the soul as easily as they part the flesh.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_lo.text: The self-crafted, rune-covered armaments of the most learned Runelords can harness the Winds’ potency each time they are brought to blows.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the Winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_un.text: In the blasted desert of deepest Nehekhara, the dead rarely remain so. Those dragged back to screaming, clanking Unlife are bound forever to the Tomb King whose will they exist only to serve.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_lo.text: The power of the Lady shone from Repanse like a halo, her sword and armour glowing with the brilliant light of divine retribution.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_lor.text: The weight of every single insult, grievance, umbrage and ill-feeling, channelled into a single, crushing swing of the axe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_un.text: More than just a pile of rubble, these rocks also split armour apart, negating its protective capability.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_un.text: Whether by some esoteric or magical means, this unit has a heightened ability to rapidly relocate to where it is needed.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_lo.text: With the utmost speed and agility, Tiktaq'to leads his death-defying Terradon squadron from atop his prized-specimen mount, Zwup.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_spe.text: Bolts of Dark Magic leap from the caster’s eyes, withering flesh and blackening the bone beneath.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: Wild and untamed, these frightening, aggressive beasts make perfect mounts for those Lizardmen with the skill to ride them.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_it.text: This particular moondial enables its owner to pull off seemingly-impossible feats of navigation and piloting.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_pro01_wea.text: Mentioned in several sagas and legends, could the White Dwarf's mighty weapon be the fabled rune axe wielded by Grimnir at the dawn of history?

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_lore.text: Fire feeds fire, two blazes together are stronger and hotter than two apart. The Kindleflame intensifies such fire.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_sp.text: An ancient Skaven spell that enables the Wizard to weaken their target's bones, causing different effects depending on who they are. All will suffer horribly, however.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_uni.text: Cygors crave the souls of enemy Wizards more than anything else.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_he.text: Supernatural reserves of strength can be brought to bear with devastating effect.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_lor.text: Those who do not wish to disappoint such a wise patron hold fast in the face of danger, lest his enlightened understanding be denied them.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_sp.text: Imbued with the purest hatred for the foe and all their ways, to better bring about an ignominious end.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_ch.text: A curious combination of eastern invention and diabolical Clan Skryre ingenuity, the Cracklebomb contains staggering explosive power in a small, yet devastating package.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_spe.text: Creatures of the dark beware, for the Mage casts a ball of pure light to banish enemies of White Wizardry.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_un.text: Of all the ways to go, being crushed is amongst the least pleasant, but it's a lot worse if you're on fire and screaming at the same time!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: It was Hotek who forged the Witch King’s armour. His ring - a trinket of obsidian and black diamond - is just as powerful.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: Helped by his ominous magical crown, those that hear the call of the Slaughterer’s big Waaagh! are suddenly overcome with uncontainable zeal.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_lo.text: He is the stone upon which the Lizardmen's enemies are broken.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_un.text: The Kharibdyss lets out a spine-chilling howl, terrifying those who would dare to stand in its path.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Wizard ensorcels allied weapons, making them burn with a savage fire. The targets of the spell are augmented with superior flaming blades.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: Formed into the image of a grimacing face, this plaque causes the unwary to go mad just by looking upon it.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_uni.text: The shrinemaster implores the fickle Chaos Gods for their aid, bestowing their dark blessings upon nearby Champions.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_wea.text: Nature manifests at Orion's call, raining a flurry of arrows upon the enemy in defence of Athel Loren.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: With its last, shuddering death throes there is a chance that one or more of the foul beast's many hearts will restart.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_un.text: Command of this ability means never again having to run out of the Winds before the fight is well and truly done.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_ite.text: The bleached skull of the long-dead Great Bray-Shaman, Rarkos, is mounted upon the bearer's staff.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_ite.text: Disgusting as it may be, a shot of Troll blood is just the thing to bolster the drinker's courage, causing an unstoppable bloodlust to rise within them.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: Gesticulating wildly, the caster gifts an allied unit with a rabid, frothing need to attack and consume the foe!
The caster utters words of power and a phoenix of pure fire manifests to swoop upon the enemy, bathing them in cleansing flame.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_bann.text: Created by Runelords who hailed from lost holds - to fight beneath this storied banner is to recall the fury of so many wrongs.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_uni.text: Dark figures move and twist within the magical miasma woven by the Fimir Balefiends as additional protection against the foe.

unit_abilities_onscreen_name_wh2_dlc12_c.text: Supreme Shield of the Old Ones

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_sp.text: Few have the strength to break free once the Kraken has them within its horrid, betentacled grasp.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ban.text: The runes of this banner twist into any language, so all victims can understand the message that the Horned Rat wants their soul.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ch.text: These sausages have quite the kick – thrown at an enemy, they violently rupture in a flesh-mangling implosion.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_un.text: As the Vampires rip apart their victims they feast on the blood that spills forth – gaining strength and replacing lost stamina.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Wizard conjures a boiling ball of magical flame and hurls it at a nearby foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_rune.text: This rune stirs up the Winds of Magic, using their swirling arcane force to protect its bearer and shield nearby Dwarfs from missile fire.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: Upon this scroll is written the 'Amber Trance'; as the foes slowly turn to amber their morale is sapped away!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_spe.text: The Bray-Shaman magnifies the savage and animalistic parts of the foe's psyche until they are nothing more than growling beasts.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_it.text: What's wrong with a bit of extra courage before a fight? Nothing, except now the combatants are considerably more flammable than before.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: A Bladesinger’s dance may start as a mesmerising, graceful pirouette, but always ends as a violent maelstrom of slicing, gashing slaughter!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ch.text: The harsh, howling desert winds cut through everything, be it armour or clothing or raw flesh.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_pro04_uni.text: The forest looks after its own.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ch.text: Copious amounts of food constantly bubbles and brews in Grom’s astringent stomach bile, causing horrendous and explosive belching that he can barely control.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_uni.text: Strong and tenacious, the Dawi’s hardy, passionate nature can be put to lethally good use on the battlefield.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_it.text: It is well known that Lustrian gold is enchanted with all manner of esoteric properties; Harkon thinks it will restore his fractured mind!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: The caster unleashes a vile disease that scours the battlefield in search of victims to infect and instantly petrify.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.text: The Cairn Wraith and the skeletal steeds pulling the Black Coach are filled with unholy vigour.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_lord.text: Such is the strength within this warrior that when they strike it is sure to be a deathblow!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: The Mistwalkers of Yvresse are called upon to defend the homeland in its hour of need.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Divining auspicious signs, the caster guides the minds of targets, augmenting them with the foresight needed for victory.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: Shaped into the leering face of an Ice Daemon, this shield is imbued with the north wind, robbing attacks of their force.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_ite.text: This cloak, renewed annually by Ariel herself, is all Orion needs to protect himself.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: Waves of pure High Magic infuse the target, radiating within the body, returning vigour and life.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Alchemist conjures a gaudy cloak of shimmering scale to improve his allies’ defensive stance.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_lo.text: Tz’arkan’s dark influence waxes and wanes, but when Malus relinquishes control entirely, the Daemon’s supernatural strength is unleashed upon the world.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ch.text: "Get yer stabbers out, boys. We ain’t leavin’ ‘til they's fulla gashes!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Shaman throws a black-capped nightshade mushroom into the air, which bursts into a cloud of murky darkness.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_it.text: This moon-shaped amulet projects a disruptive magical energy onto the enemy's defences.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: An invisible aura of horror surrounds the Wizard’s allies. Only the bravest foes now stand before them.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: It is through killing that Dark Elves rise above other beings. Once engulfed in enough bloodshed, they will often feel their murderous prowess increase, as if Khaine himself was guiding the blades of his disciples.\\n\\n[[col:magic]]This ability is being mirrored using knowledge gained from a prisoner interrogation in Athel Tamarha.[[/col]]

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_ch.text: "Pale warriors, death-pale were they all; They cried—‘La Belle Dame sans Merci thee hath in thrall!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: It is said that the legendary Kygor, the first owner of the horn, was a warrior who could stare down a Carnosaur!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_ar.text: Made from the very best Nuln-forged steel, these imported behemoths cut jungle scrub and monster flesh to shreds.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Bolts of cleansing energy fly from the Wizard’s hands, searing evil wherever they strike.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_lor.text: Belegar carries his enormous Oath Stone everywhere. In dire times, he stands tauntingly atop it to fight to the end.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: The souls of many slaves brought aboard the Black Ark are ‘extracted’ and fired into the sky by sorcerous means, only to fall back to the surface as deadly rain.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ar.text: A shroud of swirling sand is conjured to screen the spellcaster's forces from the enemy.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_weap.text: This evil weapon entraps the souls of those in cleaves, binding their fleshless remains in servitude.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Wizard casts an arcane net, created to hold the Great Deceiver himself. Any caught in its strands will struggle to act.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_hero.text: This Hero has an eye for accuracy, firing rates and enemy sweet spots. War machines will benefit from his presence.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: This pearl of blackest jet soaks up dread, fear and self-doubt, leaving its wearer stronger within.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: With powerful enchantments ensorcelled from the Warden’s Tower, the Winds of Magic are temporarily becalmed.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_rune.text: Armour inscribed with the Rune of Oath & Steel will not bend or buckle.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_pro03_lor.text: The Lichemaster raises the ancient Wight to do his bidding, but Krell serves Nagash first and foremost...

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: A cackling, flaming visage appears before the Wizard. With a gleeful screech, it swirls around the battlefield, immolating anything in its way.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_pro04_uni.text: Shadows be thy cloak and darkness thy ally.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_un.text: Steam must be let off from time to time, which leads to screaming, scalding death for any foe too close to the Emperor's Wrath during battle.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_we.text: Carved from the dense, fossilised jawbone of a monstrous, sky-borne predator that became extinct in ages long past.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_lor.text: Although the youngest of the Dark Gods, the Serpent is no less potent and can bind mortals to eternal service with alluring visions or tantalising temptations.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_it.text: The highest standard of protection... whilst also looking pretty good next to one's peers!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_her.text: The herd waits, allowing the enemy to come to them. Nature is their defence, as man will soon find out.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_sp.text: The sea is summoned, and a great tide coalesces upon the battlefield to drench all those that oppose the caster.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: Despite Throt’s efforts to the contrary, the powers gifted to his troops often come with a price of a deteriorating life expectancy.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc01_wea.text: The Sword of Change was fashioned by the Daemon Warlord Amon 'Chakai, whose fossilised eye is still grasped in the weapon's pommel.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: There are few things more bloodcurdling than the sight of the green tide of a Waaagh! in full flow – save for an even bigger Waaagh! of course!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Wizard calls upon the beneficent Guardian of Light to protect his allies from harm.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_spe.text: The Bray-Shaman drives a spear of wrath into enemy hearts, unlocking the beast within and causing them to turn against their own.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_char.text: Vampires have long had a savage and unstoppable bloodlust. They will continue to slaughter until the foe has either been turned to Undeath or lies dead at their feet.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_lor.text: Itchy, nasty buboes are spread as the spells of Plague are cast, infecting the enemy populace with sickness.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_bann.text: As the Gleaming Pennant flutters in the breeze it instils all that march under it the belief that they will be victorious.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: Wrought in black iron with an oval ruby at its centre, the Guiding Eye grants mystical sight to its wearer.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Projecting violence in a mental wave, the Shaman glowers at his target and lets loose a bolt of brain-melting force.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, eventually disappearing back to the Winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_un.text: As a channel between the mortal world and the Realm of Souls, a Hierotitan amplifies the Liche Priest’s incantations.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ch.text: Beware the scorpion's sting, hidden 'neath the desert sands yet always poised to strike.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: This pendant was crafted from the crystallised soul of the very first man to have been seduced by Slaanesh.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_un.text: Corpses bloated from spending too long at sea are like foul, decomposing balloons waiting to burst.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_uni.text: The wending and twisting of the Wardancers hardens their spirits and their bodies against would-be attackers.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_ite.text: This small idol shimmers with an eerie green light, bestowing unnatural regenerative powers upon the wearer.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_lo.text: A true predator like Ceithin-Har shows no weakness when wounded, simply becoming even more of an impulsively deadly foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: Being a towering, walking cluster of rocks means that big bits sometimes fall off you, much to the detriment of anything smaller nearby!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_we.text: This staff channels Asaph's spiteful anger into a deadly beam that spews forth onto the foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_mou.text: The tolling sound of the Screaming Bell opens fissures in the ground, allowing white-hot flame to erupt.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: The sky opens and a bolt of burning, pure Chaos black lightning hurtles towards the foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_lo.text: Forever tormenting Malus’ soul, Tz’arkan’s Daemonic puissance always simmers just beneath Malus’ skin.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_spe.text: A spray of sizzling silver slivers rain from the sky to impale the caster's enemy.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_uni.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: This potion knits bones, seals flesh and staunches the flow of blood from mortal wounds.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: This jewel was originally gifted to Morathi by Aenarion, before it was stolen by Anar; it cloaks the wearer in shadow.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_lo.text: A single blast on the 'Dragonhorn', forged in the fire of Draugnir's flaming breath, causes the foe to shrink in terror, for they know what surely follows…

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_lo.text: "Come to my cabin… You'll find it most comfortable I am sure…"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_sp.text: Kadon was able to shift his shape to that of any monster, even an Eagle. One day he found he could not change back...

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Wizard unleashes a hail of magical energy, transmuting his foes into Unliving golden statues.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_que.text: From the deepest, dankest forest depths a Treeman Ancient rises, charged with protecting its forest-kin from harm.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_fac.text: Slaughter! There is no greater glorification of Khaine, the God of Murder, and no more popular form of worship amongst the Dark Elves. It is through killing that Dark Elves rise above other beings. Once engulfed in enough bloodshed, they will often feel their murderous prowess increase, as if Khaine himself was guiding the blades of his disciples.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_lo.text: Rather paradoxically, afflicting an enemy with profound paranoia can cause them to drop their guard.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_ar.text: "Now that we have the ocean so slow, put the sails away and prepare to row; for the monster hunts and its prey should shiver, ever since the Vortex went a-quiver!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: This spell temporarily transforms allies' mortal flesh into unbreakable rock, increasing tenfold their resistance to attack.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: As the Shaman chants, he leaks fighty-energy, boosting the fierceness and prowess of friendly units nearby.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_lo.text: Like an insect sting at the point of death, striking out at the killer, sapping their strength as if shot by a thousand arrows.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: The mere sight of a Phoenix lifts the spirits of the High Elves when darkness looms.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_uni.text: These troops are emboldened when fighting, drinking and feasting together, although such ‘bravery’ is only temporary at best.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Astromancer seizes the winds of the battlefield, directing them against the foe to batter the targets with unhallowed gales.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_spe.text: Following the fate of the unsmiling warrior, Bjuna, the targets of the caster’s ire will laugh themselves to death.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_pro04_uni.text: In the midst of a bloodbath it's good to know that someone has your back.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_lo.text: Drycha’s soul eternally seethes, her external wounds only further fuelling her vindictive, murderous intent.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_lo.text: Those who go to war against Malus Darkblade feel his Daemonic aura. Those who come face to face with him are infected by it.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_ru.text: Runesmiths take particular delight in the sound of the inferior works of other races breaking like icicles beneath a hammer blow.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_we.text: Those who wield Widowmaker - those who bond with the enchanted blade - can summon forth Khaine's wrath.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_lo.text: A sudden sprouting of savage Dryads is often the first tangible warning that the forest’s savagery has truly been unleashed.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the Winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_wea.text: Scourge is a lethal whip, thirsty for blood and wrapped in the bitter curses of many generations of Bray-Shamans.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_cha.text: This poison contains a powerful narcotic and drives its victims to delusional insanity.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: And no lesser battle should suffice! Khazukan Kazakit-ha!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: The caster calls down a mighty ball of lightning and hurls it - should the foe be struck they will surely be shattered!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_un.text: Like their huge, earth-boring equivalents, Warp-Grinders can turn solid rock into dust on a smaller scale, halting enemies’ movements by pulverising the ground beneath them.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: Some Dragons’ noxious fumes alone have long-lasting effects on their target's coordination – if survived in the first place.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: The sorcerer thrusts his paws into the ground summoning forth a great gout of green flame.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ar.text: Clan Rictus' sacred Warpstones capitalise on the grim, vicious determination of its warriors to take on all comers and win.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_uni.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_lo.text: When Grom joins the fightin' with his competent, well trained boyz; it's proof to all of the ladz around him that he knows da language of da boyz.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_lore.text: Armour is little defence against a skilled alchemist, under his command metal turns into an arcane lightning rod, attracting hostile magic.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: Some Dragons breathe noxious fumes that have a long-lasting effect on their target's coordination - if it survived the attack in the first place.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_ar.text: A toxic barrage of noxious vengeance rains down upon the foe, poisoning enemies and permeating their armour.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_que.text: Basking in the attention of his chosen God, and hoping to be blessed with gifts and boons, this warrior enjoys a period of invulnerability against his foes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: Dark enchantments ensure that those who stand close to a Cauldron of Blood enjoy a degree of protection from the Bloody-handed God.

unit_abilities_onscreen_name_wh_main_spe.text: The Purple Sun of Xereus Upgraded

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: Being a towering, walking cluster of rocks means that big bits sometimes fall off you, much to the detriment of anything smaller nearby!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_un.text: The final word of the Old Ones to those not part of the Great Plan – short, clear and extremely deadly!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_spe.text: Kadon was able to shift his shape to that of any monster, even a Manticore. One day he found he could not change back...

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: By vigorously scratching his armpits - cackling maniacally as he does so - the Shaman projects painful chafing onto a nearby foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_sp.text: Acting as a conduit for a Slann Mage-Priest, the Oracle can wield magic beyond its own capabilities – at a cost.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_it.text: With the form of a Dragon’s ajar jaws, this mask offers scant protection but emanates an aura that silently softens foes – hearts, armour and all.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The caster calls down a mighty ball of lightning and hurls it - should the foe be struck they will surely be shattered!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ar.text: The Waystone controls the flow of the Winds. Its power can be harnessed to invigorate all casters on the field – be they friend or foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: White light bursts forth, quenching the spirit of the foe as a mortal might smother a spark.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ch.text: Reaching behind the wall of death to bring back the soul and bind it to you takes skill, but like anything, practice makes perfect!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: This concoction is made of Warpstone and the blood of many creatures. Its effects are devastating.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_it.text: A momentary trance induced on a subject using this magical trinket instantaneously mimics the healing effects of a dozen deep sleeps.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_spe.text: Spirits of the departed assail the Wizard’s foes, sapping their resolve and causing dread among their numbers.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_weap.text: Used by Johann Helsturm, the first Grand Theogonist. When wielded by a warrior whose devotion is beyond reproach the head of the mace glows so brightly it bursts into flame.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_un.text: In the midst of a bloodbath it's good to know that someone has your back.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: Xlanhuapec's swirling mists can take the form of elemental creatures of water or air to assist Lizardmen armies in battle.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: The blue liquid in this small bottle blesses the imbiber with a boost of preternatural speed.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ch.text: A master of exploiting others' weaknesses, Tretch and his band are never where you expect them and always where they can do most damage.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: With the incantation invoked, the Skaven stamps his horrible, rattish foot, causing the very ground to split asunder.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_we.text: The Deathsword glistens with murder and the Cursed Blade moves with a life of its own.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_lo.text: A sudden sprouting of savage Dryads is often the first tangible warning that the forest’s savagery has truly been unleashed.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: A spray of sizzling silver slivers rain from the sky to impale the caster's enemy.
Blowing on a glimmering golden whistle, the Wizard summons the spirit of Gehenna’s metal hounds to hunt down his prey.

unit_abilities_onscreen_name_wh2_main_ba.text: Sacred Banner of the Horned Rat

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_it.text: The inspirational magic of this helm can make a good leader into a great one, and a great leader into a legend.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.text: Such is the strength within this warrior that when they strike it is sure to be a deathblow!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_rune.text: Dwarfs are stubborn. The Rune of Stoicism amplifies this, reminding them never to back down no matter who they face.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_uni.text: Goaded by Chieftains and enraged by intruders on their blood-grounds, Beastmen become consumed by a savage furore!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_cha.text: Beastmen keep charging, seeking, fighting. They do not cease. They cannot.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: An orb made of the polished gallstones from the dreaded Blindwyrm is said to be able to glimpse the future.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_sp.text: When the verses are spoken, a fierce light emanates from the Undead's empty eye-sockets, enabling them to strike with supernatural speed and fury.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_it.text: This enchanted fan keeps Cylostra cool when the heat is on, improving the recharge of her abilities and reducing their cooldown times.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_we.text: This weapon’s strange, ethereal carvings betoken a power that can grant instinctive awareness of the lay of a battlefield.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_cha.text: A victim of Dark Venom knows only a drawn-out and agonising death.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_ch.text: When he shouts to stand and fight, his loyal men listen and heed their leader.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_ch.text: Inalienable and unassailable in all things, Settra's strength is such that he never needs to return to his sarcophagus.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_it.text: Whoever dons this cloak does not just become one with the forest, but one with the hardened sentinels who guard Athel Caiellin’s fluctuating portals.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_wea.text: These arrows shower their targets with dozens of razor-sharp shards; a percussive shot of death.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_uni.text: The Goblin Fanatics of Karak Eight Peaks eschew the use of balls with their chains, favouring shaved Dwarfs instead!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_uni.text: "He who runs away lives to fight another day!" - so the foul, craven adage goes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_lo.text: Never knowing pain or fear, Gor-Rok's assault is unrelenting.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_cha.text: A strong mind is needed to channel the Winds of Magic. Those that have such a gift become arcane conduits - funnelling the magical tempests to their cause.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_lor.text: The Bray-Shaman inflames the Beastmen’s urge to rend the foe, causing them to surge forward in a roaring, bellowing mass.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_ch.text: A disgusting slime smoothie thrown to the ground creates a bit of extra nourishment for da ladz!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_weap.text: The front of this shield depicts a warrior being blessed by a nameless lady. Its wielder gains protection from the sigil, especially against foes armed with missiles.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: When you are constantly emitting flammable chemicals, it is a good idea to stay as close to your enemies as possible!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_hero.text: Those who are "slippery" cannot be cornered or pinned - they simply "slip" away…

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: One too many augmentations means this unit may not make it to the end of a battle without exploding into splatters of guts and flesh!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_spe.text: With a mighty bellow, the spellcaster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: The strongest of stunty ales are good for two things – degreasing Pump Wagon parts and numbing the pain!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_uni.text: Those marked for death by the mighty Ranger or his crew may find their armour and shield of little practical use…

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: The sky opens and a bolt of burning, pure Chaos black lightning hurtles towards the foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_sp.text: The caster calls down a mighty ball of lightning and hurls it - should the foe be struck they will surely be shattered!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: The flail of Skrolk is a rusted, pitted ball of miasma that spreads poxes as it is swung.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: This tattered and stained scroll should not be held in one's hand for long as it steals all manner of essence, including magical power.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_ch.text: More than just a shield, this one channels the visceral power of the Old Ones to protect its bearer from magical attack.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_it.text: Donned by the masters of the House of Caledor, this ensorcelled armour has endured over four thousand years of battles.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_pro03_lor.text: The Lichemaster raises the ancient Wight to do his bidding, but Krell serves Nagash first and foremost...

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: The sky opens and a bolt of burning, pure Chaos black lightning hurtles towards the foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_wea.text: Made with a single, pristine hair from Queen Ariel, the Bow of Loren is a weapon without peer.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: This ornate diamond container houses a spark from the sacred flame at Asuryan's shrine; its bearers are granted resistance to magical attack.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_ite.text: A crude effigy and shamanic heirloom from one of the hag trees that grow deep in the forest.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The enemies’ weapons become heavy, cumbersome, and almost impossible to wield in battle.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_arm.text: "Ssshhh! It's a secret, yes-yes, trap shut or sewn shut, yes-yes!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_fi.text: The resilience of the Old Ones is channelled into an energy barrier that protects its users from the full brunt of magical attacks against them.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_ar.text: "Anchor the tides and slow the moons, becalm the waters for some hidden boons. Break the waves, tame the sea; how big can one beast be?"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: The supernatural solution is often the best; weapons materialise before the caster's allies, allowing them to slice through flesh, soul, and consciousness.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_un.text: There's no better defence than attack… preferably with this mass of whirling blades. Stay on the right side of it if you want to live!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Reaching into the Wind of Hysh, the Wizard draws forth ennobling energies to steady faint hearts - augmenting allies with courage.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: The bearer of this black wand, flecked in glowing jade, can increase the Winds and more quickly power his spells.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_it.text: This charmed helmet, fashioned from the skull of a slaughtered foe, protects Tretch from blows of all kinds, be they physical or magical.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_hero.text: Immortal spirits will refuse to leave the bounds of the mortal plane, and so cannot be put to rest with ease.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_it.text: Whoever dons this cloak does not just become one with the forest, but one with the hardened sentinels who guard Athel Caiellin’s fluctuating portals.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_fa.text: The spirits of warriors slain can be summoned from the Realm of Souls and bound to corporeal bodies, so that they may fight for the Tomb Kings as they did in life.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: This tankard is large and deep; when filled, only the eldest of Longbeards can sup from it.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_wea.text: The Brass Cleaver is said to be an artefact from another realm - ancient and terrible, it thirsts for blood.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_wea.text: Forged by the Witch King, the blade’s merest touch can unmake enchantments and wither minds.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc17_sp.text: With a mighty bellow, the spellcaster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_spe.text: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_uni.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_we.text: This blade, blessed by the Ptra the Sun God, channels the baking heat of the unforgiving Nehekharan desert into each deadly blow it makes.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc12_sp.text: Mighty Lord Kroak spawns a small sun that, when it explodes, causes abject devastation… funnily enough.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_her.text: Such is the strength of Sigmar's favour that enemies fail to act in the presence of such brilliance.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_lo.text: Tz’arkan’s limitless appetite for souls enables him to use his Daemonic power to extract the very lifeforce from surrounding enemies and channel it through himself.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: The Shaman implores the sky with wild gesticulations. The almighty green foot of the Orc god descends to crush the foe!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_unit.text: The Black Coach manifests gleaming scythes, as sharp as the night is dark.
Sent mad by drinking fungus brew, Night Goblin Fanatics are released from their mobs as a twirling cyclone of destruction armed with a large ball and chain!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_lo.text: Gor-Rok has survived horrendous wounds and bears monstrous scars, yet has never once wavered in his duty.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_rune.text: Those that have the Rune of Courage will never fear the horrors they face.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_un.text: Enemies who fight near a Bloodwrack Shrine find their minds twisted by the echo of the Medusa’s endless despair.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: A shard of pure aqua, its surface ripples with a malevolent curse bestowed upon it by the Trickster. Any magic-users nearby will surely suffer.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc14_ch.text: With almost un-Skaven-like focus, Snikch moves unseen through the battlefield until the moment of murderous truth.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_lo.text: Under Isha's embrace, those of fey heart will be protected; that is the Everqueen's will.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_lo.text: Grom is a veritable symbol of greatness, his prodigious size rivalling even the greatest Orcs, and his ambition to conquer outweighing them all.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_un.text: A constantly spiking fever is a symptom of a botched augmentation, but the explosive side effects make the subject a potentially effective weapon.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_que.text: This 'gift' from the Dark Prince causes the unit to spontaneously die and mutate into Chaos Spawn, surprising everyone - themselves included!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc11_ch.text: "You're nowt but a bunch of lily-livered landlubbers! Know that your deaths will be short - soon you'll serve under the black flag!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_he.text: "Should I stay-stay, or should I go-go?"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_it.text: In Undeath, Settra's crown transcends its original ceremonial purpose to imbue nearby warriors with the Imperishable's all-pervading, unalterable will.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_ite.text: Wrought within the great Warpforges beneath Skavenblight, this armour radiates an evil aura.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: Blowing on this ancient horn will summon a legendary Ancestor back from Valaya's bosom to aid in the fight.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Bolts of Dark Magic leap from the caster’s eyes, withering flesh and blackening the bone beneath.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc13_we.text: It is believed that the Old Ones themselves guide the hand of he who wields the Mace of Ulumak.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: A massive tower-shield usually taken into battle by Iron Wardens. Its bulk is worth the protection it provides.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_it.text: With the form of a Dragon’s ajar jaws, this mask offers scant protection but emanates an aura that silently softens foes – hearts, armour and all.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_un.text: Hidden ability to add cp for unbreakable attribute in blood voyage army.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_wea.text: "These are days of great power: the tribes of the North, the beasts of the forest and a great prince of Kharnath will baptise this world in blood!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_spe.text: The supernatural solution is often the best; weapons materialise before the caster's allies, allowing them to slice through flesh, soul, and consciousness.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_hero.text: There are those who have a knack for pushing artillery and their crews to new heights, allowing such machines to fire further than ever before.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc09_sp.text: When the verses are spoken, a fierce light emanates from the Undead's empty eye-sockets, enabling them to strike with supernatural speed and fury.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_cha.text: Cursed to wander the length and breadth of the world, his never-ending quest to challenge and best the most gifted warriors.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_lore.text: As the powers of Dark Magic are wielded for the purpose of Necromancy, its unwholesome energies invigorate the Undead.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc08_her.text: Werekin flesh is scored with the symbols and marks of the Dark Gods, granting additional arcane protection to their ravaged physical forms.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc16_it.text: With the form of a Dragon’s ajar jaws, this mask offers scant protection but emanates an aura that silently softens foes – hearts, armour and all.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_her.text: The truly hawk-eyed always hit their targets. Always.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_que.text: Morghur's Bray-Shaman channels the Beastlord's power to spread corruption across the battlefield, causing greater damage to his foes as time goes by.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_spe.text: Behold the Vermintide; the Wizard calls and the rats will answer!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_her.text: The presence of the Dark Omen is an awful thing that saps the foe's will to fight on.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: Many Mages remember a spell from long ago that could move mountains: the Assault of Stone.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc04_uni.text: The unholy, never-to-be spoken words of this ancient grimoire cause the Winds of Magic to blow like a hurricane.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_spe.text: This spell calls to the creeping things of the undergrowth, sending a swarm of spiders, centipedes and slug-beetles onto the foe.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: A spray of sizzling silver slivers rain from the sky to impale the caster's enemy.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: The Black Periapt is a grandiose gem of sullen darkness whose power can only be realised in the hands of a spellcaster.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc05_ite.text: These arrows shower their targets with dozens of razor-sharp shards; a percussive shot of death.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_rune.text: In adversity, Dwarfs look to the runes of the Ancestors - remembering the duty that is now their own to bear - and refuse to break.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_item.text: Those that consume a Potion of Toughness find their skin hardening as swords and arrows glance off their body, even on parts not covered by armour!

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc03_wea.text: The Axe of Men is so-called because it hacks through men as easily as other, lesser axes, hew timber.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc15_un.text: "Green boss says move! Fasta! Fasta! Move, find, crush!"

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_qu.text: When the Carnosaur runs amok, stay out of sight and get ready to duck.
When the Carnosaur runs amok, stay out of sight and get ready to duck.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Following the fate of the unsmiling warrior, Bjuna, the targets of the caster’s ire will laugh themselves to death.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_main_lor.text: Morathi's strange, magical allure enchants opponents, making them question their loyalties and allegiances.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc06_uni.text: Clogging the senses with acrid, stinging smoke leaves an enemy completely vulnerable.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_dlc01_uni.text: Summoned creatures exist in this world on borrowed time, disappearing back to the winds from whence they came.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_weap.text: This rusted mace drips with Nurgle's choicest plagues and bears an enchantment that ensnares the souls of those crushed beneath its filth-encrusted mass.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_char.text: With an arcane cry, all around rally to fight in battle once more.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh2_dlc10_it.text: Such a ring is wrought in runes of cooling, allowing its bearer a certain immunity from fire.

unit_abilities_tooltip_text_wh_main_spel.text: Mork gives the Shaman the ability to project beams of coruscating energy from his eyes.
